spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout preservation. Room adjacency and wall alignment are highly accurate to the source. Minor deductions for simplified door swings and exact window pane proportions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. Roof is removed, all rooms are present, and the model floats on a clean dark background with zero text or UI elements.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is precise, including kitchen counters and appliances. Minor deduction for the omission of the specific round rug in the dining area.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly geometry, flat shading, no textures, and a correct orthographic isometric camera angle.

detected_errors.description: Minor omission of floor rugs and small decorative plant elements noted in the original 2D plan.
Simplified door representations instead of explicit swing arcs shown in the 2D layout.
